channel.title: Please help
channel.description: [sup] :) :) OK so i need help, whenever i try logging into moparscape it shows "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then click "Start Server" to make your own." so i do that and then it just shows [b]Hybrid Server[/b] The server has succesfully started. Log in with any account username and password. Have fun. and i try logging in again and it wont work, i tried going to the server IP column, and i try some but they dont work, what do i do? :confused: :confused: :confused:[/sup]

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @Try_Me Try Me
item.description:
@Try_Me wrote:

you go here sign up and read there tuts

http://lagexx.smfforfree2.com/index.php

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @Informer Informer
item.description:
@Informer wrote:

You create any user name and pass but for the ip 127.0.0.1 or go to the client open it go to “help” then “server status” then you need to copy the Server IP and server port then go back to the client and go to “file” then go to new server and paste the server ip you copied or just write it to paste hit ctrl+v then hit enter then go to “file” again on the client then go to new port and type or paste the port of the server.

Enjoy,happy gaming!

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @bub2001 bub2001
item.description:
@bub2001 wrote:

[sup] OK so i need help, whenever i try logging into moparscape it shows “Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “Cancel” then click “Start Server” to make your own.”
so i do that and then it just shows Hybrid Server The server has succesfully started. Log in with any account username and password. Have fun. and i try logging in again and it wont work, i tried going to the server IP column, and i try some but they dont work, what do i do? [/sup]
